name: Instant Cashback Report
query:
select
  pe.reporting_name as `Reporting Name:Data:150`,
  pe.posting_date as `Posting Date:Date:100`,
  pe.party as `Party:Link/Customer:100`,
  pe.party_name as `Party Name:Data:175`,
  pe.base_amount as `Gross Amount:Currency:100`,
  pe.paid_amount as `Net Amount:Currency:100`,
  (pe.base_amount-pe.paid_amount) as `Cash Back Amount:Currency:100`,
  (pe.base_amount-pe.paid_amount) as `Difference Amount:Currency:100`,
  pe.mode_of_payment as `Mode of Payment:Data:150`,
  pe.special_payment as `Payment Type:Data:100`,
  (select group_concat(distinct item.brand)
    from `tabSales Invoice Item` item join `tabSales Invoice` inv on inv.name = item.parent
    where
       inv.docstatus < 2
       and inv.posting_date between (pe.posting_date - interval 5 day) and (pe.posting_date + interval 5 day)
       and inv.customer = pe.party
   ) as `Applicable Brands:Data:150`,
  pe.reference_details as `Notes:Data:200`
from
  `tabPayment Entry` pe
where
  pe.docstatus = 1
  and pe.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
  and (pe.special_payment is not null and pe.special_payment <> '')
